articles.title: U.N. investigators say Israel committing 'genocide' in Gaza; Israel rejects 'distorted and false report'
articles.description: A United Nations Commission of Inquiry concluded on Tuesday, September 16, 2025, that Israel has committed genocide in Gaza, citing the scale of killings, aid blockages, forced displacement, and destruction of a fertility clinic. Israel categorically rejected the report as “distorted and false.”

articles.title: Charlie Kirk shooting suspect not cooperating with authorities, says Utah Governor
articles.description: Following the assassination of conservative activist Charlie Kirk, suspect Tyler Robinson is not cooperating with authorities. DNA evidence was found near the scene, linking Robinson to the crime. The incident has also led to firings and reprimands for individuals making online posts perceived as mocking or condoning Kirk's death.

articles.title: Heavy rains cause floods in Dehradun's Sahastradhara; two missing
articles.description: Heavy rains on Monday night, September 15, 2025, caused severe floods in Dehradun's Sahastradhara area, damaging roads and requiring the State Disaster Response Force (SDRF) to carry out rescue operations. Two people were reported missing, and over 100, including students, were rescued.
